alert.note: Alert for Breathitt (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 18 at 12:47PM EST until February 18 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... North Fork Kentucky River at Jackson affecting Breathitt County. ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...North Fork Kentucky River at Jackson. * WHEN...Until this evening. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, HWY 541 near the Kentucky Mountain Bible College is impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:00 PM EST Saturday the stage was 24.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 3.4 feet Thursday morning. - Action stage is 23.0 feet. - Flood stage is 29.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. The next statement will be issued by 8 PM EST Saturday.
